questions.text: Who was the first President of the United States?
questions.explanation: George Washington served as the first president of the United States from 1789 to 1797.

questions.text: In which year did World War II end?
questions.explanation: World War II ended in 1945 with the surrender of Germany in May and Japan in September.
The Mona Lisa is a half-length portrait painting by the Italian artist Leonardo da Vinci.
